languages.text: "Я получил сообщение на вокс-частоте арбитров — они успешно обороняют вверенный им шпиль. Даже если весь Даргонус падет, это место устоит".
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
languages.original_text: "Я получил сообщение на вокс-частоте арбитров — они успешно обороняют вверенный им шпиль. Даже если весь Даргонус падет, это место устоит".

traits.locale_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."
"I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

languages.text: “我通过法务部的音阵频道收到了信息，我们的人顺利守住了他们所在的尖塔。即便整个达戈努斯都沦陷了，那座尖塔也绝对不会失守。”
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: “我通过法务部的音阵频道收到了信息，我们的人顺利守住了他们所在的尖塔。即便整个达戈努斯都沦陷了，那座尖塔也绝对不会失守。”

languages.text: «Recibí un mensaje por la vocofrecuencia de los Arbitrator: están defendiendo la aguja que se les confió. Aunque caiga todo Dargonus, ese edificio se mantendrá a salvo».
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: «Recibí un mensaje por la vocofrecuencia de los Arbitrator: están defendiendo la aguja que se les confió. Aunque caiga todo Dargonus, ese edificio se mantendrá a salvo».

languages.text: « J'ai reçu un message via la fréquence-vox des arbitrators : ils défendent leur tour avec succès. Même si Dargonus venait à succomber, cet endroit tiendrait bon. »
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai reçu un message via la fréquence-vox des arbitrators : ils défendent leur tour avec succès. Même si Dargonus venait à succomber, cet endroit tiendrait bon. »

languages.text: 「アービトレイターのヴォックス周波数で通信を受け取りました。彼らは任された尖塔を無事に防衛しています。たとえダルゴナス全体が陥落しても、あの場所は持ちこたえるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターのヴォックス周波数で通信を受け取りました。彼らは任された尖塔を無事に防衛しています。たとえダルゴナス全体が陥落しても、あの場所は持ちこたえるでしょう」

languages.text: "Yargıcı'nın voks frekansından bir mesaj aldım. Kendilerine emanet edilen kuleyi başarıyla savunuyorlarmış. Koca Dargonus düşse bile orası ayakta kalacak."
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı'nın voks frekansından bir mesaj aldım. Kendilerine emanet edilen kuleyi başarıyla savunuyorlarmış. Koca Dargonus düşse bile orası ayakta kalacak."

languages.text: "Ich habe eine Nachricht auf der Vox-Frequenz der Arbitratoren erhalten – sie verteidigen erfolgreich den Turm, der ihnen anvertraut wurde. Selbst wenn ganz Dargonus fällt, wird dieser Ort bestehen."
languages.original_text: "I received a message on the Arbitrators' vox-frequency — they are successfully defending the spire entrusted to them. Even if all Dargonus falls, that place will hold."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine Nachricht auf der Vox-Frequenz der Arbitratoren erhalten – sie verteidigen erfolgreich den Turm, der ihnen anvertraut wurde. Selbst wenn ganz Dargonus fällt, wird dieser Ort bestehen."
